commit message: added initial series info to programme listing
added recording summary to data model
added star rating to programme data model
show an alert dialog when deleting recordings
catch exception when no external media player is installed
when an external player is requested but not installed, query google play for one.
make sure onScreen episode info is not null
keep track of htsp protocol version
fix content type for servers using htsp version above version 5
cosmetics to programme view and its listings
query imdb titles rather than any random category (only works with the web-based version of imdb)
correclty hide programme description widgets when there is no info to display
show season count, episode cant and part count when available
UI: added light theme and allow channel logos to be hidden
some cosmetics to the date formatting
disable transcoding options to avoid confusion until transcoding capabillities can be detected at runtime
default to external player, the internal player will most likely require transcoding
